sentences.sContent: Behind the words, at once self-pitying and vainglorious, the merits of the case were overwhelming.
sentences.sContent_eng: Behind the words, at once self-pitying and vainglorious, the merits of the case were overwhelming.
sentences.sCn: 在那些既是顾影自怜而又自命不凡的字眼后面，事情本身的是非曲直是无可争辩的。

sentences.sContent: He was silent for a minute , casting about for the least vainglorious way in which to express himself.
sentences.sContent_eng: He was silent for a minute , casting about for the least vainglorious way in which to express himself.
sentences.sCn: 他沉默了一会儿，想找到个最不虚荣的方式表达自己的意思。

trans.tranOther: too proud of your own abilities, importance etc
